name: Outplacement Tools
overview:
Outplacement Tools is an online career marketing service that helps individuals with personal marketing in a web 2.0 world. Licenses are typically purchased by corporations as part of employee down sizing. Each licensee receives online access to the portal’s content and software. Services include: resume building software, an instant and robust personal website creation system, professional business cards, financial planning software, job search 2.0 content & links as well as a Job Search Radar license.

Job Search Radar is the most powerful job search technology available. We provide deep databases of corporate information including Hoovers data. We then allow individuals to mine and download information for best-fit target companies. Business intelligence is then provided through daily emails that provide all job listings AND all news events related to the targeted best-fit corporations. Our technology effectively allows job seekers to set up individual spiders or web agents to monitor the Internet specifically for the job search campaigns. The system is fully integrated with LinkedIn for social network mining. The interface also includes a recruiter database and a centralized CRM to track all job search activity.

Our services help individual’s organize their personal marketing, improve their online identity management and ultimately find work faster! Licenses start at $295.
